tasks.label: plcnext_new_project
tasks.detail: Create a new PLCNext PLM project
tasks.command: echo Make a new PLCNext project with name ${input:plcnext_project_name} && cd src/projects && plcncli new project -n ${input:plcnext_project_name} --force && cd ${input:plcnext_project_name} && plcncli set target --add -n AXCF2152 && plcncli generate all && echo Finished making new PLCNext Project

tasks.label: plcnext_new_program
tasks.detail: Create a new plcnext PLM Component
tasks.command: echo Make a new PLCNext program for project ${input:project_name} with component ${input:plcnext_component_name} and program name ${input:plcnext_program_name} && cd src/projects/${input:project_name} && plcncli new program -n ${input:plcnext_program_name} -c ${input:plcnext_component_name} && plcncli generate all && echo Finished making new PLCNext Program

tasks.label: plcnext_new_component
tasks.detail: Create a new plcnext PLM Component
tasks.command: echo Make a new PLCNext component for project ${input:project_name} with component name ${input:plcnext_component_name} && cd src/projects/${input:project_name} && plcncli new component -n ${input:plcnext_component_name} && plcncli generate all && echo Finished making new PLCNext Program

tasks.label: plcnext_build
tasks.detail: Build a PLCNext PLM project. Note: do not use this method if the port definitions have changed since it does not generate the required code for this.
tasks.command: export BUILD_TYPE=Release && echo Build PLCNext project for project ${input:project_name} && echo Build PLCNext libs && cd src/libs/Utils && plcncli build &&  cd ../../projects/${input:project_name} && plcncli build --verbose && plcncli deploy

tasks.label: plcnext_gen_build
tasks.command: export BUILD_TYPE=Release && echo Build PLCNext release project for project ${input:project_name}  && echo Build PLCNext libs && cd src/libs/Utils && plcncli build &&  cd ../../projects/${input:project_name} && plcncli generate code --verbose && plcncli generate config --verbose && plcncli build --verbose && plcncli deploy

tasks.label: plcnext_libs_build
tasks.command: export BUILD_TYPE=Release && echo Build PLCNext libs && cd src/libs/Utils && plcncli build

tasks.label: plcnext_run_cppcheck
tasks.detail: Run cppcheck on both PLC projects and libs
